{"id":508016363,"lang":"java","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1623715414,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/508016363/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Second Largest Digit in a String","memory":"38.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int secondHighest(String s) {\n        int max = -1, secMax = -1;\n        \n        for (char ch : s.toCharArray()) {\n            if (Character.isDigit(ch)) {\n                int c = ch - '0';\n                if (c > max) {\n                    secMax = max;\n                    max = c;\n                } else if (c > secMax && c < max) {\n                    secMax = c;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return secMax;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"second-largest-digit-in-a-string"}
